mapper.select: SELECT 'MID' || LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NVL(MAX(MEMBER_ID), 'MID00000000000000000'), 4, 20)) + TO_NUMBER(1), 17, '0') AS member_id FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID ,CI ,MEMBER_RN ,MEMBER_PWD ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_STATUS ,JOIN_DT ,LEAVE_DT ,LAST_CONTACT_DT ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DT ,CHG_USER_ID ,CHG_DT ) VALUES ( #{memberId} ,#{ci, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{memberRn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{memberPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,NULL ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#{regUserId} ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#{chgUserId} ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID ,CI ,MEMBER_RN ,MEMBER_PWD ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_STATUS ,JOIN_DT ,LEAVE_DT ,LAST_CONTACT_DT ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DT ,CHG_USER_ID ,CHG_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
